qas.question: What is the Premier League Championship trophy based on?

answers.text: The design of the trophy is based on the heraldry of Three Lions that is associated with English football.

qas.question: Where on the trophy can two of the lions be seen?

answers.text: Two of the lions are found above the handles on either side of the trophy

qas.question: Where can the third lion be seen?

answers.text: the third is symbolised by the captain of the title winning team as he raises the trophy, and its gold crown, above his head at the end of the season

qas.question: What do the ribbons on the trophy mean?

answers.text: The ribbons that drape the handles are presented in the team colours of the league champions that year.

qas.question: The Golden Boot is made of sterling silver, silver gilt and which semi-precious stone?
On what type of metal band are the title-winning clubs listed on the Golden Boot?
What does the green colour of Malachite on the Golden Boot represent?
How many lions are found on the Golden Boot?
Who symbolizes the third lion not found on the Golden Boot trophy?

answers.text: the captain of the title winning team

qas.question: The trophy is based on Four Lions associated with what?

plausible_answers.text: in the team colours of the league champions that year

qas.question: The ribbons draped upon the gold crown are presented how?

plausible_answers.text: symbolised by the captain of the title winning team as he raises the trophy

qas.question: How is the second ribbon symbolised?
What has a golden band around its circumference?
What is made of solid gold and silver gilt?
